name: Mini Blush and Luminize Trio
about: What it is:A gift-worthy set of glow essentials with minis of bestselling Soft Pinch Liquid Blush and Positive Light Liquid Luminizer in new and fan-fave shades...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This set was inspired by Rare Beautyu2019s viral dewy blush hack. It features the bestselling Soft Pinch Liquid Blush in Virtue (beige peach) and exclusive Beloved (muted oxblood) for a soft, lasting flush, and a Positive Light Liquid Luminizer in the exclusive shade Enliven (peach with gold flecks) gives skin a luminous glow..This Set Contains:
ingredients: Soft Pinch Dewy Liquid Blush in Virtue: .Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Mica, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Isododecane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850). ..Soft Pinch Dewy Liquid Blush in Beloved: .Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Mica, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Isododecane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850)...Positive Light Liquid Luminizer in Enliven: .Isododecane, Mica, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Octyldodecanol, Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Isostearic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tin Oxide, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Soft Pinch Liquid Blush Mini:.-Gently remove excess product from applicator and place one to two dots on each cheek..-Use fingertips or brush to gently pat into skin for a seamless finish. .-Rememberu2014a little goes a long way! ..Positive Light Liquid Luminizer Mini .-Apply one to two dots directly over any areas you want to add a touch of glowu2014high points of cheeks, brow bone, the bridge of your nose. Blend with fingertips or brush...Tip: .-To create an extra-dewy flush (inspired by the Rare Beauty glowy blush hack), mix your fave shades of Positive Light Liquid Luminizer and Soft Pinch Liquid Blush on the back of your hand. .-Then blend onto cheeks with a brushu2014we recommend using Soft Pinch Blush Brush (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IMO a great introduction to Rare Beauty. (Iu2019m in my 40s and just beginning to experiment with the blush craze. 50/50 chance Iu2019ll just look drunk and sunburnt, lol) On me this set delivers a u201cnatural but betteru201d look. I think some of you complaining about it have a little blush-blindness, lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love rare beauty okay but. only buy if you like orange blushes.. i bought it and they didnu2019t look orange but when i tried on the light blush look like straight orange bronzer and then i tried the red one hoping it would be cute and no! its orange. more of a pinky peach orange but still orange and the highlighter itu2019s okay it didnu2019t show up on the skin that well so i had to put a lot and when i did my nose was a little orange but not to much. ufffc

reviews.review_text: Very small bottles, super expensive for size, nothing special about these liquid blushes. Just work like everything else in the market tbh.

reviews.review_text: The two pink blushes in this set last all day. The creamy formula is easy to blend and has a luminous finish. The highlighter in my set was dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: BEAUTIFUL!! Ordered this as a birthday present to myself and it did not disappoint. As a neutral light skinned girlie, I've only worn soft pink blushes, including Hope from Rare Beauty. so glad I gave these new shades a try! Beloved actually looks very natural once blended out and with a VERY small amount (IYKNK). Virtue will be great for the summer time and can be used as a blonzer. mixed with mesmerized just adds extra glow, while still looking natural. love love love!!! the only blush formula I'll ever need!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT. BEAUTIFUL COLORS. I ORDERED PICK UP AND IT WAS VERY EASY!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love!!!! The blushes are so nice! Beloved is a deeper mauve kind of color and is stunning! Virtue is a more orangey color and is pretty too!! The highlighter though is a little sheer and is not my favorite shade of their highlights. I would still definitely recommend this kit! You wonu2019t regret!!!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. I mix a tiny bit of all 3 and get the perfect blend of rosy and glowy.

The formula is lightweight yet buildable, giving you that natural, radiant flush without feeling heavy. It also lasts all day, so you donu2019t have to worry about touch-ups. Definitely a must-have in your makeup collection!ud83dude0dud83eudef6ud83cudffb

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect little set! So good for travel, I brought this on a two week international trip and it was everything I needed. There is enough of a depth difference between the blushes to be able to create a solid look- eyeshadow, face, itu2019s perfect for both, even lips! Love the deeper shade in particular but all three were fab for my skin tone.

I have a full size one for $32, so getting 3 in different shades let's you see which one matches your skin most. In the set is a shade for every style. I will for sure re purchase in the future.

reviews.review_text: These blushes are ok - I was expecting much more from all the hype they have, but I think there are better liquid blush options. I also didnu2019t find it to be especially glowy. The size is also TINY, so Iu2019m glad that I was able to get these during the Black Friday sale, as I donu2019t think you should spend $50 on them.
The bottles are TINY! Iu2019m glad I bought this on sale and used some of my points for this purchase. Would not buy again

reviews.review_text: The reviews were a little mixed but so glad I took a chance. My skin is dry and I am obsessed with the young, fresh, dewy look. A little goes a long way and if you have a good brush it blends beautifully.

reviews.review_text: These are SAMPLE sizes! Very misleading labeling them mini. Miniu2019s are supposed to bigger than samples and smaller than the full size. This should be given as a FREE gift with purchase or something similar. Thereu2019s not much product in them so donu2019t be fooled.

reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few daysu2026.i absolutely love it. At first the price seemed really expensive. But this product looks like it will last me easily months or even a year. Money was well spent with this set.

reviews.review_title: great trio - Beloved needs to be made permanent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin and already own & love Virtue, and I was pleasantly surprised that Enliven makes a great blush topper and isn't too dark for me. But Beloved... ohhhhh that's the star here. The perfect neutral-red blush.  Rare Beauty: please please please please please make Beloved part of the standard collection! It's so pretty, so neutral, so flattering, and with none of the 'clown' vibes that pure reds sometimes have. I love it very much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have many of these blush shades, I wanted to try the beloved shade and it is everything I wanted it to be, absolute perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was a bit dissatisfied with the colors as they were not very flattering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are so cute.. love the shades but a little goes a long way..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first attempt at Rare blushes and I'm loving the quality. First of all, these colors are perfect for my medium/tan skin tone, adding an interesting touch that lights up any makeup. Also, although these are mini version, I feel there's a nice amount of product in them. I would recommend 100%.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great value and beloved is the perfect oxblood color. I was after the deepest shade of the new hourglass blush but I prefer beloved and I get a variety of three shades instead of just one. Layering them all together is stunning as well. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First, I just wanted to point out that the highlighter is much darker than it appears in the swatch photo. In indoor lighting, the shade looks like a medium peach (as it's described) on my lighter skintone. But in outdoor lighting, it's a lot deeper and more pink. If you have a lighter skintone, this shade will not work as a stand-alone highlighter. As a highlighter, I think the color will work beautifully for deeper skin and work for all skintones when mixed with the blushes for a more radiant finish. Now when it comes to the blushes..I can not tell you how long I've been waiting for them to release a shade like Beloved in their dewy formula! It is similar to the shade Love in their matte formula but has more of a red undertone, while love has more of an orange undertone. If you love a good sunburn blush, you will love this set! Because if you have a lighter skintone or you're a little intimidated by the darker shade, mixing the two blush shades together will still give you the same effect, just a little more toned down. Individually, the shades may not work for everyone, but as a set, it's extremely customizable, making it suitable for all skintones! Love that!
